name: HuHu AI Agent for E-Commerce
tagline: AI E-com agent that converts 5x more from just a URL
description: Effortlessly generate and edit high-converting product visuals through chats. HuHu AI Agent works as your customized assistant to create everything you need for your online store. ✅ One photo, all your content. ✅ Revamp with a URL. ✅ Reach more customers.

name: findable.
tagline: Get to #1 on ChatGPT w/ SEO 2.0
description: The complete LLM SEO toolkit to rank well across ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity, Google Gemini and more. Monitor, analyze, and optimize your AI search visibility.

name: AI Phone Screener by Hyring
tagline: Screen 1000 candidates before lunch
description: Supercharge your top-of-funnel. Hyring’s AI Phone Screener screens candidates over the phone. It’s like having a team of recruiters making 100s of calls, 24/7. Using AI Video Interviewer by Hyring? Now you can combine both to fully automate the first 2 rounds!

name: One Dollar Resume Review
tagline: Professional resume review for just $1
description: After reviewing 1000s of resumes, helping 20+ companies from USA and India founded by founders from exceptional backgrounds (Stanford, Google, YC, etc.), we have built an AI-powered Resume Review tool that helps anyone to identify the most common issues.

name: BugPic
tagline: Identify any insect in seconds, just by snapping a photo
description: BugPic helps you identify insects in seconds. Snap a photo to learn what it is, if it bites, where it lives, and why it’s interesting. Works with butterflies, moths, beetles, ants, spiders, and all the mystery bugs you find in the wild (or your bathroom).

name: Bilbo
tagline: Metabase AI Agent
description: AI agent for Metabase that empowers teams to query, explore and visualize data using natural language.

name: Big Weather
tagline: Crafted for calm, clear skies
description: Big Weather is a hand-crafted, beautiful weather app exclusively for the Mac menubar.

name: Google Search Web Guide
tagline: An experimental AI-organized search results page
description: Web Guide is a new Google Search Labs experiment that uses AI to intelligently organize your search results. It groups web links into helpful categories, making it easier to discover information.

name: HunyuanWorld 1.0
tagline: From a word or image to an explorable 3D scene
description: HunyuanWorld 1.0 by Tencent is the first open-source model for generating immersive, explorable 3D worlds from a single text prompt or image. It exports standard 3D mesh assets, making it compatible with game engines and creative pipelines.

name: Annot8
tagline: The fastest way to tag images for object detection datasets
description: I built Annot8 because I thought current options for labeling object detection datasets were way too slow. With drag-and-drop uploads, hot-keys, instant export, it’s now much faster. If you're training vision models, I seriously think it'll save you time

name: SelfDDx
tagline: The on-demand symptom checker that thinks like a doctor
description: When you feel sick, you might start with Google or ChatGPT. But generic searches don’t think like real doctors. SelfDDx asks the right questions. You get personalized, real answers. No appointments. No co-pays. 24/7. The new face of medical care is free.

name: Winter Comics
tagline: Instantly turn your stories into comics and animations!
description: Winter Comics is a Substack for Comics and Animation with an AI Copilot. You can transform written stories into comics, create animations and publish in minutes.

name: Cannon Studio
tagline: The Cutting Edge of AI Content Creation
description: Cannon Studio is the future of filmmaking — an all-in-one, AI-powered platform where you can create anything from YouTube Shorts to full-length films in a cohesive cinematic universe, complete with consistent characters, locations, lore, and more.

name: Vings
tagline: Banking & crypto wealth management all in one place
description: Vings is a personal finance app that allows you to manage your wealth across banking and crypto all in one place. Track, analyze, and grow your portfolio with our unified wealth management platform. Built by someone who was tired of "spreadsheet Saturdays"

name: Index Youtube (llm.txt)
tagline: Turn any YouTube video into structured data with URL tweak
description: Change any YouTube URL from youtube.com to indexyoutube.com and instantly turn videos into LLM ready structured data - including summaries, keywords, and full metadata.

name: WalletGPT
tagline: Voice-First AI Powered Expense Tracking App
description: Tired of typing your expenses? WalletGPT lets you log transactions just by speaking. Powered by AI, it understands your voice, categorizes your spending, and gives you smart insights—hands-free. It's like ChatGPT, but for your wallet.

name: LeadsOnTrees - VC Funding Webhooks
tagline: Your AI agents will never miss a new funding event!
description: Stream real-time VC funding events and acquisition announcements directly to your AI agents and applications. Enterprise-grade webhook infrastructure with sub-second latency.

name: IceInbox
tagline: Tool to send personalized cold emails for email marketing
description: Transform your outreach with IceInbox - the ultimate cold email platform for job seekers, recruiters, and businesses. Send personalized emails to HR contacts with AI-powered templates, contact management, and analytics.

name: Subwise
tagline: A subtle way to track subscriptions — Chrome-ready & wise.
description: 💡 Subwise gives you a subtle dashboard and Chrome extension to manage all your subscriptions—no more surprise charges. Track spending, split payments, and get alerts before fees hit. 🎮 Bonus: There's a Tetris game too because tracking finances is boring.

name: Cuty AI
tagline: Create & edit stunning images in seconds — just by chatting.
description: With Cuty AI’s chat-to-image tool, you can create and edit stunning visuals in seconds — just by chatting. Whether you're starting from a prompt or uploading a photo, Cuty turns your ideas into high-quality images instantly.

name: HuHu AI Agent for E-Commerce
